author: crossley
msg: Cocoon "Running modes" are not supported in Cocoon-2.1
So removing WEB-INF/properties/prod|dev which were added by FOR-917.
We only used one experimental property "org.apache.xml.resolver.verbosity" whichhas been moved to WEB-INF/properties/core.properties file.
